search.query: | table sourcetype, firstTime, lastTime, recentTime | rename totalCount as Count firstTime as "First_Event" lastTime as "Last_Event" recentTime as "Last_Update" | fieldformat Count=tostring(Count, "commas") | fieldformat "First_Event"=strftime('First_Event', "%c") | fieldformat "Last_Event"=strftime('Last_Event', "%c") | fieldformat "Last_Update"=strftime('Last_Update', "%c") | stats dc(sourcetype) as sourcetypecount

| table sourcetype, firstTime, lastTime, recentTime | rename totalCount as Count firstTime as "First_Event" lastTime as "Last_Event" recentTime as "Last_Update" | fieldformat Count=tostring(Count, "commas") | fieldformat "First_Event"=strftime('First_Event', "%c") | fieldformat "Last_Event"=strftime('Last_Event', "%c") | fieldformat "Last_Update"=strftime('Last_Update', "%c") | where First_Event >= relative_time(now(), "-30d") | stats dc(sourcetype) as sourcetypecount

panel.title: sourcetypes not logged data last 30 days

search.query: | table sourcetype, firstTime, lastTime, recentTime | rename totalCount as Count firstTime as "First_Event" lastTime as "Last_Event" recentTime as "Last_Update" | fieldformat Count=tostring(Count, "commas") | fieldformat "First_Event"=strftime('First_Event', "%c") | fieldformat "Last_Event"=strftime('Last_Event', "%c") | fieldformat "Last_Update"=strftime('Last_Update', "%c") | where Last_Update <= relative_time(now(),"-30d") | stats dc(sourcetype) as sourcetypecount

| table sourcetype, firstTime, lastTime, recentTime | rename totalCount as Count firstTime as "First_Event" lastTime as "Last_Event" recentTime as "Last_Update" | fieldformat Count=tostring(Count, "commas") | fieldformat "First_Event"=strftime('First_Event', "%c") | fieldformat "Last_Event"=strftime('Last_Event', "%c") | fieldformat "Last_Update"=strftime('Last_Update', "%c")
index=* | top limit=100 sourcetype | eval percent = round(percent,2)

panel.title: all new sourcetype add in the last 30 days

table.search: https://10.155.255.139:8000/en-US/app/search/reassure_assets_dashboard/editxml# | table sourcetype, firstTime, lastTime, recentTime | rename totalCount as Count firstTime as "First_Event" lastTime as "Last_Event" recentTime as "Last_Update" | fieldformat Count=tostring(Count, "commas") | fieldformat "First_Event"=strftime('First_Event', "%c") | fieldformat "Last_Event"=strftime('Last_Event', "%c") | fieldformat "Last_Update"=strftime('Last_Update', "%c") | where First_Event >= relative_time(now(), "-30d")

panel.title: all sourcetypes not logged any data for 30 days

search.query: | table sourcetype, firstTime, lastTime, recentTime | rename totalCount as Count firstTime as "First_Event" lastTime as "Last_Event" recentTime as "Last_Update" | fieldformat Count=tostring(Count, "commas") | fieldformat "First_Event"=strftime('First_Event', "%c") | fieldformat "Last_Event"=strftime('Last_Event', "%c") | fieldformat "Last_Update"=strftime('Last_Update', "%c")| where Last_Update <= relative_time(now(), "-30d")

index=_internal source=*license_usage.log type="Usage" | eval indexname = if(len(idx)=0 OR isnull(idx),"(UNKNOWN)",idx) | eval sourcetypename = st | bin _time span=1d | stats sum(b) as b by _time, pool, indexname, sourcetypename | eval GB=round(b/1024/1024/1024, 3) | fields _time, indexname, sourcetypename, GB
